#include<iostream>
#define m 1000000007
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int f(long long int x,long long int y,long long int z)
{
	
 
unsigned long long int ans=1,square=x;
 
if(y==0)
    return 1;
while(y!=0)
{
    if(y%2)
        ans=ans*square;
    square=(square*square)%z;
    y=y/2;
    if(ans>z)
        ans=ans%z;
}
return ans;}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		
	
	int n,a,b;
	cin>>n;
 	 unsigned long long int ans=1;
 	if(n<13)
 	cout<<0<<"\n";
 	else
 	{	
 		a=((n-13)/2);
	 	for(int i=a+1;i<=(6+((n-13)/2));i++)
		{
			ans=(((ans%m)*(i%m))%m);
			
		}
		unsigned long long int b=f(720,1000000005,1000000007);
//		cout<<"\n\n"<<b<<"   "<<ans<<"\n\n";
		ans=((ans*b)%m);
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
 	}
	}
}
